transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Amol ji, good afternoon.
Customer: Very good afternoon ji, kaun bol rahe ho?
Executive: Amol sir, Suraj baat kar raha hu, Siriya ka senior.
Customer: 
Executive: Aap listing mein kuch problem bata rahe the, usi ke liye maine call kiya hai ke bataye sir thoda sa kaha pe problem aa rahi hai. Main online hi tha.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji, ji sir, Amol ji.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Listing mein kya problem aa rahi hai? Aap ladki bata rahi thi inko sir ko listing mein problem aa rahi hai, to maine kaha main baat kar leta hu.
Customer: Listing mein dekhte hai na kuch bhi ye nahi hai aapka, sabke baki jo customer hai sab upar dikhte hai.
Executive: 
Customer: Mai video bhi abhi dal raha hu, aapko video dekhe.
Executive: Video bhi dekh lunga, koi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Haan. Abhi aisa nahi aana chahiye, aisa jitna matlab ye karke bhi paisa kharcha karke bhi aap aisa niche rakhenge.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sab jaisa dekho abhi.
Executive: Sir, aap pareshan mat ho Amol ji, main ye keh raha tha aapne account login kar rakha hai is time pe apna?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Aap matlab kaha pe dekh rahe hai? Mobile pe dekh rahe ho, laptop pe dekh rahe ho?
Customer: Mobile pe, mobile pe dekh rahe hai.
Executive: Accha, mobile pe dekh rahe hai aap.
Executive: Ek second.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Ye video bhi aapko bhej raha hu.
Customer: Ye main hi dal raha hu.
Executive: Jaise main check kar raha hu yaha pe.
Customer: Hello? Ruko main ek aapko video bhejta hu, fir baat karenge uske upar, dekh lo aap.
summary:
Concerns:

- Listing is not showing up properly.

- Other customers are showing up on top.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the listing issue.

- Executive asked if customer logged in account.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a video for reference.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- listing, visibility, account, mobile
